name: J.I.M Bomb
description:
A bomb is about to detonate at the Lucky Cat factory, it’s bound to create a mess impossible to mop up! It’s up to Jim, the retired janitor robot, to save the day...

Control J.I.M with W,A,S,D

Speed Up holding Shift

Jump with Spacebar

Created by students at Pulse College

Trevor Connolly - Character Design, 3D Modelling (Character and Environmental),  Concept Art

Ciaran Patterson - 3D Modelling, Texturing, SFX, Concept Art

Siobhan Catinot - Lighting, 3D Modelling, Tetxuring, Colourboard Artist, Concept Art

Gary Flynn - Storyboard Artist, Character Rigging, Character Animation, UI, Concept Art

Alan Donnelly - Game Concept, Game Design, Environment Animations, Music, SFX, Concept Art
